title: ChatGPT falsely told voters their mayor was jailed for bribery. He may sue.
description: The AI chatbot falsely told users that Australia's Hepburn Shire mayor Brian Hood was jailed in an international bribery scandal. He was actually the whistleblower.

title: Walmart to add EV charging to thousands of stores by 2030
description: Walmart plans to add the EV charging stations to stores coast-to-coast, more than quadrupling its current network of roughly 280 locations.

title: Your phone may now have tools for making your calls sound less lousy
description: Let's face it -- regular phone calls don't always sound great. To help, Apple and Google have built new software features to make us sound more clear mid-chat.
